name: Copper-Bot
description:
*Headphones Recommended*

This is a submission to the newbies game jam 2022-2.

Play as a little copper robot and use your ability to self-destruct to create platforms and complete levels. You only have 5 seconds to use the platform so be careful.

Controls:

-A/D or Arrow keys = move

-Space/Z = jump

-R/X = self-destruct

Credits:

- Programming and Art : M1chaelDev

- Music and SFX: JollyGoodFriend

Game Engine: Godot

Art Tool: Aseprite
